channel.title: Commuting on Flavio Hafner
channel.description: Recent content in Commuting on Flavio Hafner

item.title: The Equilibrium Effects of Workersâ€™ Outside Employment Options: Evidence from a Labour Market Integration
item.description: We study a reform that eased cross-border commuting from France to the high-wage Swiss labor market. The results thus show that if labour supply is elastic enough, the local labour market can expand and absorb additional competition for workers.
